articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: Astronomers Observe Most Distant Organic Molecules in Universe - VOA Learning English
articles.description: Scientists say they have observed the most distant organic molecules known to exist in the universe. The molecules were discovered, with the help of NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope, in a galaxy more than 12 billion light years from Earth.
articles.content:
Scientists say they have observed the most distant organic molecules known to exist in the universe.
